body.name: bkigfyi Kawaii Car Neck Pillow 2 Pieces Anime Car Decoration Plush Recliner Headrest Plush Car Head Neck Cushion Suitable for Most car Seats
features: [Cute Neck Pillow]: A variety of cute-shaped car neck relaxing soft pillows,cute and warm design,you will enhance your driving pleasure by having such a beautiful pillow in the car while driving,super plump Soft touch,like a pillow on a cloud,a variety of sizes are available,relieve neck pain,hyperbolic and ergonomic design,provide perfect support for your neck when driving,no longer on long trips pain.

[Wide use]: This neck relaxing cushion is very soft,with a super elastic elastic band design on the back,which is convenient for this neck massage cushion to be fixed on the back of the chair,suitable for all kinds of chairs,car seats,Home,travel and office chairs.This is a cute pillow.

[Exquisite workmanship]: This cartoon car professional pillow is very soft,using healthy and environmentally friendly reactive printing and dyeing technology,and the color is bright and does not fade.The fabric is made of super soft crystal velvet,polished and anti-wrinkle.High-grade PP cotton,good elasticity,not afraid of kneading,soft texture,durable,making the neck feel more comfortable and non-irritating.It has super elasticity,soft and cute sealing appearance.

[Perfect gift]: If you don't know what gift to give to your friends or family,then this cartoon car neck pillow is definitely a perfect gift.No one can stop such a cute and practical soft neck relaxing pillow as a gift for yourself.Receiving this gift will make you happy.It is the best accessory for the car and the best companion for a better life.

[Packaging]: We use professional evacuation tools to pack, because products themselves take up more volume,only take time to transport the product to better protect the product,so when you receive the product,it is slightly less than the description Don't be surprised if it is small or a little wrinkled,because this is normal.After opening it,shake it for a few times and expose it to the sun for half an hour,and it will recover immediately!
body.description: Designed for cars, but suitable for a variety of occasions. Such as use it at home, travelling and office. Never worry about neck problem during long time flight, train or bus. Just enjoy your trip.
